p:
We fitted model 1 to ZIKV data separately in Martinique, Guadeloupe and Saint-Martin using the K first weeks of data (varying K from 5 to the number of weeks in the epidemic) and each a priori distribution (NI, R or L), to obtain posterior distributions for parameters
R
0 , Z
, ρ
Z and ϕ
Z for every combination of island, K and choice of prior.
